request.description:
list bigiq managed bigips filtering on hostname, managementAddress and uuid

uuid is used to execute tasks against devices, like collectins ucs and executing scripts

item.name: bigiq capture bigip ucs - documented way

request.description:
This is the documented api to tell bigiq to capture a ucs of specified device.

From:  https://devcentral.f5.com/wiki/iControl.Backup_and_restore_resource.ashx

"name" will set the exact name for ucs

response.name: bigiq capture bigip ucs - documented way

item.name: bigiq capture bigip ucs - bigiq ui way

request.description:
Discovered by watching bigiq ui

Just set the "namePrefix" and it will append that to the hostname with date/time.

response.name: bigiq capture bigip ucs - bigiq ui way

item.name: bigiq capture bigip ucs - bigiq ui way - hostname

request.description:
cleaning up device query string

Discovered by watching bigiq ui

Just set the "namePrefix" and it will append that to the hostname with date/time.

response.name: bigiq capture bigip ucs - bigiq ui way - hostname
bigiq capture bigip ucs - bigiq ui way
bigiq list bigip ucs

response.name: bigiq list scripts
response.body:
{
    "items": [
        {
            "id": "04b5e68f-14a5-4988-bfed-792f4a1219d7",
            "name": "python_gethostname_test",
            "description": "small python script to get hostname",
            "script": "#!/usr/bin/python\nfrom socket import gethostname; print gethostname()",
            "generation": 1,
            "lastUpdateMicros": 1553254273293133,
            "kind": "shared:user-scripts:userscriptstate",
            "selfLink": "https://localhost/mgmt/shared/user-scripts/04b5e68f-14a5-4988-bfed-792f4a1219d7"
        },
        {
            "id": "4c6a0772-0400-4dcd-8abf-e8d8f3fad4a4",
            "name": "force_update_root_admin_pass",
            "description": "executes tmsh commands from bash to force update of root/admin passwords",
            "script": "tmsh modify auth user admin password f5rocks\necho -e \"f5rocks\\nf5rocks\" | tmsh modify auth password root\ntmsh save sys config",
            "generation": 1,
            "lastUpdateMicros": 1553254346580364,
            "kind": "shared:user-scripts:userscriptstate",
            "selfLink": "https://localhost/mgmt/shared/user-scripts/4c6a0772-0400-4dcd-8abf-e8d8f3fad4a4"
        }
    ],
    "generation": 3,
    "kind": "shared:user-scripts:userscriptcollectionstate",
    "lastUpdateMicros": 1553254346581684,
    "selfLink": "https://localhost/mgmt/shared/user-scripts"
}

request.description: executes a script on bigiq on the defined bigip
executes a script on bigiq on the defined bigip
